performance_at_interview_what_to_improve: We would like to thank you for participating in the recent interview. Unfortunately, we had quite a strong field of applicants and the school is not in a position to offer more than one training place. Whilst the school felt that you showed great potential for teaching they did not feel that you are quite ready for the PGCE/School Direct just yet. They recommend obtaining some observation experience in the autumn term before the new application cycle opens. If you should be unsuccessful in your other choices please do not hesitate to make contact to arrange some observation experience.
